document_data.mainbody:
Vagr Natali was the master of House Natali in Melvaunt in 1374 DR.
Vagr was elected leader of his house after his father died during Dornig Leiyraghons ascension.
In 1374 DR, many of the children of Melvaunts noble house went on adventures and disappeared. Vagr agreed to speak with the adventuring party hired by Lord Woarsten Nanther to find the boys, claiming his innocence despite his son being the only one to remain.
Vagr still hated Dornig for the death of his father.
